mapper.insert: insert into BroadcastFile (BroadcastFileID, RealFileName, FilePath, FullFilePath, CreateTime, FileSize, UserID, FileType, CustomFileName, State) values (#{broadcastFileID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{realFileName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{filePath,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{fullFilePath,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fileSize,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{userID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fileType,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{customFileName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update BroadcastFile set RealFileName = #{realFileName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, FilePath = #{filePath,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, FullFilePath = #{fullFilePath,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, CreateTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FileSize = #{fileSize,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, UserID = #{userID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FileType = #{fileType,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, CustomFileName = #{customFileName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, State = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER} where BroadcastFileID = #{broadcastFileID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select BroadcastFileID, RealFileName, FilePath, FullFilePath, CreateTime, FileSize, UserID, FileType, CustomFileName, State from BroadcastFile where BroadcastFileID = #{broadcastFileID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
